about_the_game:
Welcome to Apocalypse Party - a 3D top-down view super-ignited game! Unlike Project Zero, this game will take you on a journey through a fantasy medieval world, saving the apocalypse and letting you and your friends start a post-apocalyptic carnival! Are you ready to face nightmare-like enemies?

■ Massive Talent Selection, Free Skill Matching ■


This game introduces more weapons and talent systems, with a level of more than 10 times that of the previous game! The talent system is based on a term mechanism, with more diverse gameplay and more strategic battles. You can freely match and combine different weapons and skills according to your preferences and needs, creating the most suitable combat style for yourself and creating a unique post-apocalyptic hero!

■ Featured Online Mode, Play With Friends ■


In this game, you are no longer fighting alone! The multiplayer mode, allows you to invite friends to form a team and coordinate strategies based on their abilities. Only by creating the strongest team can you eliminate all obstacles and save the future!

short_description: Apocalypse Party is a 3D top-down action Roguelike game. In this game, you will embark on a new mission to traverse through the Middle Ages and gradually master abilities, and arm yourself to become the strongest survivor through numerous choices.
